title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with latest UI code, when I try to close all the editors by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: The file should be closed as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Launch the application with build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Open multiple editors.
3. Create a new file (e.g., f1.txt) in one of the editors.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
5. Verify that all the editors are closed including the unsaved file.
